Founders and Trainers

Mined Minds was created and will be run by Amanda Laucher and Jonathan Graham.

Amanda



Amanda grew up in Nemacolin and has been passionate about programming since an early age. She has become a world-renowned software developer, and has worked across several continents and speaks every year at many international events.

Find Out More

Jonathan



Jonathan's first introduction to code was through music, where he experienced the power and potential of programming. He has now switched careers from science to software development and has not looked back.
